list.notice: Your information will not be shared, saved, or submitted.
Provide complete and accurate information to get the most relevant results.
This form is not an application. You will need to apply for benefits with each agency.

alertBanner.heading: Error status
alertBanner.description: All fields marked required must be completed.

chevron.heading: Your Custom List
chevron.description: Here is your list of potential Federal Benefits. Your state, city or employer may offer other benefits. Visit each agency providing the benefit to learn if you are truly eligible and conduct an actual application.

qualified.heading: Results
qualified.description: Based on your answers you meet the criteria to qualify for these benefits:

chevron.heading: Benefits You Did Not Qualify For

notQualified.heading: Results
notQualified.description: Based on your answers you did not meet the criteria to qualify for these benefits:

eligibleResults.heading: Results
eligibleResults.description: You may be eligible for these benefits.

notEligibleResults.heading: Benefits you did not qualify for
notEligibleResults.description: Based on your answers you are not eligible for these benefits. You may become eligible if you enter additional information or your situation changes.
notEligibleResults.cta: See benefits you did not qualify for

relativeBenefits.heading: Other benefits that might be relevant to you

shareResults.heading: Sharing and printing
shareResults.description: Copy a link to this page with the criteria you selected above. Make sure to share it only with those you trust as your answers will be visible.

shareResults.heading: Share results
shareResults.description: Your information will be viewable. Only share with those you trust.

date.alert: Date should follow the format 01 - January 22 1977
